allow:
Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "# Embedding Pipeline Setup

## Goal
Extract text from deployed Docusaurus URLs, generate embeddings using **Cohere**, and store them in **Qdrant** for RAG-based retrieval.

## Target
Developers building backend retrieval layers.

## Focus
- URL crawling and text cleaning
- Cohere embedding generation
- Qdrant vector storage" -Number 1 -ShortName "embedding-pipeline")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "# Embedding Pipeline Setup\\n\\n## Goal\\nExtract text from deployed Docusaurus URLs, generate embeddings using **Cohere**, and store them in **Qdrant** for RAG-based retrieval.\\n\\n## Target\\nDevelopers building backend retrieval layers.\\n\\n## Focus\\n- URL crawling and text cleaning\\n- Cohere embedding generation\\n- Qdrant vector storage" -Number 2 -ShortName "embedding-pipeline")

Bash(python -c "from main import chunk_text, validate_and_sanitize_url; print('chunk_text test:', len(chunk_text('This is a test sentence. ' * 20, chunk_size=50))); print('URL validation test:', validate_and_sanitize_url('https://example.com'))")

Bash(python -c "import sys; sys.path.append('.'); from main import chunk_text, validate_and_sanitize_url; print('Chunk text test passed:', len(chunk_text('This is a test. ' * 10)) > 0); print('URL validation test passed:', validate_and_sanitize_url('https://example.com') == 'https://example.com')")
Bash(python -c "from bs4 import BeautifulSoup; print('XML parser test:', BeautifulSoup('<test>content</test>', 'xml').get_text())")
